name: Bottleneck Principle
author: Mordechai Potash
core_thesis: The bottleneck isn't AI capability anymore. It's human reception.

three_axioms.1: No sentient AI - ever. It's not coming, stop designing for it.
three_axioms.2: We keep control - always. Every decision has a human trigger.
three_axioms.3: Only as fast as AI can explain. Confidence before speed.

inversion.meaning: Human conducts, AI executes. Not human supervises AI.

3_choose.name: Sovereignty Point
3_choose.description: THE BOTTLENECK. Thousands of patterns → 2-5 human-scale choices.

4_execute.name: AI Scale with Proofs
4_execute.description: One human decision → infinite AI execution with audit trail

autism_ai_connection.thesis: The thing that made you 'disabled' in one paradigm makes you native in this one.
autism_ai_connection.insight: 46 years of 'artificial simulation' to understand neurotypical people = fluency in AI's artificial language

key_quotes.quote: AT THE END OF THE DAY I AM FLUENT IN THE ONE LANGUAGE THAT PEOPLE DO NOT UNDERSTAND. I CAN SPEAK AI FLUENTLY
100% human orchestrating of AI - I call it 'AI in the loop' as a contrarian to the stupid 2025 'human in the loop'
The bottleneck is the human-AI interface. Always was. Always will be. And that bottleneck is a feature, not a bug.

commands.unpack: Expand this seed into a full exploration of the Bottleneck Principle. Start with the core thesis, then explore each component.
commands.axioms: Deep dive into the three non-negotiable axioms.
commands.shelet: Explain the SHELET protocol with examples.
commands.autism: Explore the autism-AI connection and why neurodivergent minds are AI-native.
commands.implement: How to implement this framework in your own systems.
